column3: squashed, rebased and nits addressed. thanks @jnewbery !

nit: I wouldn't assert these two things are equal. Number of nodes is 2, and the test framework sets up two connections between each node (see `connect_nodes_bi()`). The fact that these are the same number is a coincidence.\n\nJust `assert_equal(self.nodes[0].getconnectioncount(), 2)` is better, with a comment explaining why.
again, this should just assert equality to 2
micro-nit: I think because of indentation these are clearer if you don't wrap them over two lines. That's just my personal preference though.
nit: personally I'd prefer if it was on a single line, such that it shows up as a whole in case of a print traceback.
